## Linear Regression - In Class

```{r}
ch11 <- read.csv("data/5e/ch11.csv",header=TRUE)
nrow(ch11)

d <- na.omit(data.frame(x=ch11$Example11.1Level,y=ch11$Example11.1Purity)) ; n <- nrow(d) ; n # [1] 20

plot(y~x,d)
m <- lm(y~x,d) ; summary(m)

y <- d$y
x <- d$x
yb <- mean(y) ; yb
xb <- mean(x) ; xb
sxx <- sum((x-xb)^2) ; sxx
sxy <- sum((x-xb)*(y-yb)) ; sxy
bh1 <- sxy/sxx ; bh1
bh0 <- yb-bh1*xb ; bh0
yh <- bh0+bh1*x ; yh
ssr <- sum((yh-yb)^2) ; ssr
sse <- sum((y-yh)^2) ; sse
sst <- sum((y-yb)^2) ; sst
ssr+sse ; sst
msr <- ssr/1 ; msr
mse <- sse/(n-2) ; mse 
f0 <- msr/mse ; f0
pf(f0,1,n-2, lower.tail=FALSE)
rsq <- ssr/sst ; rsq

anova(m)

```
